categories: Category:Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO

nodes.text: Droids\Ewoks is a card game released by the Spanish company Heraclio Fournier in 1986. Each card depicts characters and scenarios from the Star Wars Droids cartoon series, the first season of the Ewoks cartoon series, and the toy packaging for the Star Wars: Droids and Star Wars: Ewoks toy lines. Each card also includes a short synopsis of plot events from those TV series.
